vsParam:
Hmm, Verbena... What's going on? Are you
thinking about how to win in rock-paper-scissors?

Not even close!
... But you're right on time.

... Actually,
I have a question for you.

Yes. Hmm... I'm a bit curious.
My stories... are passed down as legends, right?

Hmm, yes. There's a biography called
"Life of Verbena, the Valiant Female Pirate".

I see... A biography...
Hmm, I want to ask something about this biography.

Tell me the truth... What stories of me does it write?
And how are these stories told...?

Ah, I want to know that too!
Tell us now, Anise~!

I see. Let me think... The climax in the biography
would be the battle with the 20m long giant squid.

Hmm. It's the battle with the sea monster, right?
But, I remember the monster was about 50m long...

And there were 3 of them.
But they were killed and then eaten by us.

Three 50m long sea monsters!?
Oh my god. That was so impressive...

Ah, hmm. Let me think...
And the showdown with the great pirate Barubarius.

You challenged a big fleet of over 50 ships with only one
ship, and won after fighting for three days and three nights...

50? Barubarius's fleet was called the "Scorching Fleet",
and it had at least 100 ships.

And, we didn't fight for three days and three nights.
Because I took care of Barubarius very quickly.
Took care of the great pirate quickly!?

Yes. What else!?
Does the book say anything about my crew?
Not at all. There's nothing related to your crew in it...

Gee. What a boring book...
And what it says is not even close to the facts.

... Ha-ha-ha. Looks like Verbena was much more
powerful than in the biography...

Of course.
I was a great pirate.

Gee. The author is so irresponsible. I can understand if he
exaggerated my achievements, but he really understated them.

And... he didn't mention anything about "that man".
What was he doing...

Ah, "that man" again!
Verbena! Who's that man...?

Hehe. This is a secret.
I'll tell you sometime later.

Mmm... Please excuse me.
Thanks, guys.

Gee. She left without finishing her words, again...
Who on earth is "that man"...

No idea...
And there's nothing about him in the biography...

There's no clue at all. But, I'm really curious about it...
I guess we can only wait for Verbena to tell us.

Yeah...
Hmm— I really want to know...
